title: Exclusive: 7-Seater Sofa with Chair for under £900!
content:
The Astbury 7-seat modular corner rattan set from Outdoor Living is perfect for big gatherings. The Stylish modular design allows you to move each piece individually to create the perfect style to fit your patio or garden. This stylish seating area allows all your family and friends to sit together in comfort while enjoying the outdoors, and with this exclusive deal, it can be yours for just £889, plus free delivery – that’s a saving of £106. To take advantage of this offer, simply use the code WOW-ASTBURY-2021 at checkout.

Save up to £106 now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

About the set: 

  • 7-seat modular corner rattan 
  • Neutral tone
  • Includes centrepiece coffee table, cushion pads and covers
  • Made from all-weather garden fabric to withstand the British weather!
  • Coffee table comes with a tempered glass tabletop, which ensures durability and makes it easy to wipe clean
  • Weather and water-resistant cushions 

Purchase your set now for just £889, plus free delivery. Just don’t forget to enter code WOW-ASTBURY-2021 at the checkout.

Save up to £106

Offer ends 15/09/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. If you have any questions about the online shopping deal itself, or if you would like to work with us as a partner, please email deals@bikeradar.com
author: Steve Newell
